verses.text: In that day every place shall be opened to the house of David and to the inhabitants of Jerusalem for removal and for \f + \fr 13:1 \fl Or, \ft departure. \f* separation.

And it shall come to pass in that day, says the Lord of hosts, \add that\add* I will utterly destroy the names of the idols from off the land, and there shall be no longer \add any\add* remembrance of them: and I will cut off the false prophets and the evil spirit from the land.

And it shall come to pass, if a man will yet prophesy, that his father and his mother which gave birth to him shall say to him, You shall not live; for you have spoken lies in the name of the Lord: and his father and his mother who gave him birth shall bind him as he is prophesying.

And it shall come to pass in that day, \add that\add* the prophets shall be ashamed every one of his vision when he prophesies; and they shall clothe themselves with a garment of hair, because they have lied.
And \add one\add* shall say, I am not a prophet, for I am a tiller of the ground, for a man brought me up \add thus\add* from my youth.

And I will say to him, What are these wounds between your hands? and he shall say, \add Those\add* with which I was wounded in \f + \fr 13:6 \fl Alex. \ft The house of my beloved. \f* my beloved house.

Awake, O sword, against my \f + \fr 13:7 \fl Alex. \ft shepherd. \f* shepherds, and against the man \add who is\add* my citizen, says the Lord Almighty: \x + \xo 13:7 \xt Matt 26:31 \x* strike the shepherds, and draw out the sheep: and I will bring my hand upon the little ones.
And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* in all the land, says the Lord, two parts thereof shall be cut off and perish; but the third shall be left therein.

And I will bring the third \add part\add* through the fire, and I will try them as silver is tried, and I will prove them as gold is proved: they shall call upon my name, and I will hear them, and say, This is my people: and they shall say, The Lord \add is\add* my God.
